stories.title: Phase 1 - Critical Complexity Reduction
stories.description: Refactor ship.ts, toolchain-generator.ts, cache-manager.ts with service extraction. Reduce complexity from 56/40/32 → <15. Extract service methods with tests. All existing tests must pass.
testCriteria: npm run lint shows reduced errors

stories.title: Phase 2 - High Complexity Functions
stories.description: Refactor 5 high-complexity functions (pm-hooks, detection.ts, explore.ts, feature-spec-loader). Reduce complexity from 25-31 → <15. Implement strategy patterns for pm-hooks verbosity. Extract detection helpers.

stories.title: Phase 3 - Security Fixes & File Splitting
stories.description: Fix all 9 security vulnerabilities (regex DoS, PATH injection). Split oversized files (init.ts, explore.ts) into <300 lines. Add security tests. Ensure no circular dependencies.
testCriteria: TypeScript compiles without circular dependency warnings

stories.title: Phase 4 - Automated Cleanup & Verification
stories.description: Run automated fixes for nullish coalescing warnings (89 occurrences). Reduce ESLint warnings from 338 → <50. Final verification that all 1300+ tests pass and CI pipeline is green.
